titleStmt.title: An exposition of the divine standard of prayer, styl'd the Lord's Prayer of the preface, conclnsion [sic], and of every petition of it, as of the prayer of the kingdom of Messiah, the Lord Jesus Christ / by T. Beverley.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
